name: Housing Opportunities
description: MEDA’s Housing Opportunities program provides one-on-one coaching sessions and group workshop curriculum in English and Spanish. Homeowners also learn how to protect themselves from predatory lenders and coaches conduct loan document reviews. MEDA is a HUD-Approved Housing Counseling agency and a member of the local collaborative known as HomeownershipSF, which strongly advocates for affordable housing. MEDA CAN HELP YOU: -Gain financial education, -Obtain credit coaching, -Get information on do
